Package cp213

Class Order

java.lang.Object
cp213.Order
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable
public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.print.Printable
Stores a HashMap of MenuItem objects and the quantity of each MenuItem ordered. Each MenuItem may appear only once in the HashMap.
Version:
2021-11-01
Author:
your name here, Abdul-Rahman Mawlood-Yunis, David Brown

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(MenuItem item, int quantity)
      Update the quantity of a particular MenuItem in an order.
      Parameters:
      item - The MenuItem to purchase - the HashMap key.
      quantity - The number of the MenuItem to purchase - the HashMap value.

    • getSubTotal

      public java.math.BigDecimal getSubTotal()
      Calculates the total value of all MenuItems and their quantities in the HashMap.
      Returns:
      the total price for the MenuItems ordered.

    • getTaxes

      public java.math.BigDecimal getTaxes()
      Calculates and returns the total taxes to apply to the subtotal of all MenuItems in the order. Tax rate is TAX_RATE.
      Returns:
      total taxes on all MenuItems

    • getTotal

      public java.math.BigDecimal getTotal()
      Calculates and returns the total price of all MenuItems order, including tax.
      Returns:
      total price

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String version of a receipt for all the MenuItems in the order.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • update

      public void update​(MenuItem item, int quantity)
      Replaces the quantity of a particular MenuItem in an Order with a new quantity. If the MenuItem is not in the order, it is added. If quantity is 0 or negative, the MenuItem is removed from the Order.
      Parameters:
      item - The MenuItem to update
      quantity - The quantity to apply to item

    • print

      public int print​(java.awt.Graphics graphics, java.awt.print.PageFormat pageFormat, int pageIndex) throws java.awt.print.PrinterException
      Specified by:
      print in interface java.awt.print.Printable
      Throws:
      java.awt.print.PrinterException
